rect.style: stroke:#000000; fill: none; stroke-width: 1.5; filter: url(#buttonBlur);
stroke:#000000; fill: none; stroke-width: 1.5; filter: url(#buttonBlur);
stroke:#000000; fill: none; stroke-width: 1.5; filter: url(#buttonBlur);

text.style: fill: #D8D3C5; stroke: #E8E3E5; font-size: 22; letter-spacing:0.1; text-anchor: middle;
